and I'm not sure how you'd separate things off with elasticsearch - it'd be a lot of overhead to run a how ES cluster for each user (or even each user who just wants to search a small amount of content).

no need for writing; just upload a new index after an update.
xapian searches over unlocked NFS work fine; though there's some performance overhead at first as the commonly-used blocks get into the system disk cache.
spacelog-type static data is unusual these days, though, so it's not clear to me it'd be worth your time supporting it.
